WelcomeNewUserOrRestor: Do you want to create a new profile or restore an existing one?
WelcomeNewUserIDCreated: A new profile ID has been created, it is really important to keep it safe. The ID is mandatory for later backup restores.
BookmarkDisclaimerDescription: In order to manage the bookmarks, they must be enabled for analysis.
BookmarkDisclaimerText: Don't worry, your bookmarks and all data will stay on your PC and will NOT be transferred to the Internet.
UsageDataDescription: At various parts of this application need to process and display various anonymous usage data, for the bookmarks statistics.
UsageDataShortDisclaimer: Please also provide us with this data for the further development of the application! The data will only be transferred anonymously and encrypted and serve to improve the applications to your needs.
PopupWelcomSettingsUndoneShort: It is not yet time to do that
PopupWelcomSettingsUndoneLong: This menu is only available when all necessary settings have been made on the Welcome page.
